transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir kaise hain aap?
Customer: Haan abhi theek hoon madam aap bahut dafa phone kiye the lekin hum phone utha nahi sake.
Executive: Sir woh kitna call gaya maine aapko.
Customer: Haan haan hum dekha tha dekha tha hamara mera shareer kharab tha woh aapka fever hua tha fever fever yeh weather change ho raha hai na.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Isliye shareer kharab tha aur aap bahut dafa phone kiye the hum phone utha nahi sake isliye hum bol rahe hain ki mam suniye na kal kal kal aapko 10:30 baje theek hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Hum main hi phone karunga 10:30 baje aapko phone karunga aur jo jo baat hai woh aapko ho jayega theek hai.
Executive: Actually kya hai na sir ki dekho almost aap dekho toh chhe mahine ho gaye hain na.
Customer: Mera jo mera jo inquiry aa raha hai usme respond nahi ho raha hai mam hai na.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Wohi wohi hum wohi aap bolna chahte the theek hai koi baat nahi kal hum system khul ke aapke saath baithunga aur jo jo hai mere ko ek baar bol dijiyega woh click kar dega aur jo jo baat hai usko hum ek baar set kar lenge theek hai na.
Executive: Actually kya hai na sir ki aapke agar main dekhu na aapke aisa nahi ki product line mein IndiaMART business nahi deta hai sir.
Executive: Achcha khasa business aa sakta hai aapko IndiaMART ke through.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Hai na ab jaise aap almost dekho toh matlab ki jitna bhi buylead balance humko aaj tak aaya hai na sir chhe mahine mein woh sara balance humne sir waste hi kiya hai matlab use hi nahi hua hai bilkul bhi uska.
Customer: Wohi wohi hum bol rahe hain kal ke kal ko ek baar hum system khol kar aapke saath ek baar baithe woh ek baar hum kar lenge theek hai.
Executive: Application nahi hai kya aapke paas sir IndiaMART ki.
Customer: Haan hai main suniye na hai lekin hum dusre kaam mein hai woh kya hai actual hamara actual hamara jo sheet ka jo project hai na woh hum bol rahe hain hamara jo Hawrah lock hai waha ke bagal mein hum jo dusra factory lagaya woh sheet ka factory aapka chalu ho gaya lekin usse zyada jo 4 14 sheet hota hai matlab 4 foot lamba 14 inch chaura jisko hum kehte hain Bombay rolli wohi production kal se shuru hoga isliye is is is problem mein hum hum guzar rahe hain theek hai isliye hum best hai.
Executive: Toh yeh sheet jo hai kaun si color coating sheet banate hain kya sir aap?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi woh brass sheet ka hai woh brass sheet ka hai woh aapka jo copper sheet hota hai na copper sheet brass sheet wohi hum sheet banate hain yeh na hamara naya project hai aur yeh yeh aapka jo yeh aapka jo jo hamara jo unit hai unka naam alag dala hai kyunki hamara toh Hawrah lock hai unka naam is is is entity ka naam hai HL Shetan Engineering Works HL Shetan Engineering Works unit two hai aur ek ek hai unit one jo hai woh hamara jo Bargachia bolte hai jo jagah hai waha pe hum unit one hai waha pe hum woh aapka jo steel almira wrought iron aapka jo cot hai woh woh woh sab cheez banate hain lekin unit two mein yeh kaaj karte hain aur yeh lagbhag aapka jo do saal mein na do saal mein aapka shuru ho gaya lekin kal se woh bada machine jo hai woh chalu hoga uska level lock aa chuka hai toh humko dekhiye usko humko training dena hoga kaise chalate hain toh isliye isi kaam mein hum best hai isliye phone hum utha nahi sakte aur koi baat nahi mam kal hum hamara matlab kaam halka hai toh aapko 10:30 baje ek baar phone kar lenge aur aapko jo jo hai ek baar hum zaroor karenge yahi hum bol rahe hain.
Executive: Hmm nahi woh toh main samajh gayi sir aap call bhi kar loge koi baat nahi sir hai na lekin sir mujhe chahiye ki koi aapka jo IndiaMART ki jo services hai na woh properly use kare.
Executive: Jaise aap mujhe bata rahe ho ki aapke do teen kaam chalte hain hai na toh fir aapka toh busy schedule chalega aage bhi.
Executive: Toh fir koi person rakhoge iske liye ki aisa kya karoge aap batao mujhe.
Customer: Suniye na actual kya hai hum hum actual hum dekhte hain production ko dekhte hain theek hai aur jab samay samay samay jab milte hain fursat jab milte hain toh hum office official jo kaam hai woh hum karte hain woh aapka jo yeh yeh kaam ho gaya toh isliye is kaam mein hum busy ho jate hain isliye hum phone utha nahi sake toh koi baat nahi kal toh hum karenge lekin.
Executive: Toh aap ek kaam karo na sir sabse haan.
Customer: Haan haan jo haan suniye na mera baat suniye na bol rahe hain jo aapka jo mera jo dusre jo number hai na actual jo 9831297303 woh actual wohi wohi jo hamara jo dusra jo portal mein dusre jo mera add chal raha hai woh aapka jo trade India woh hum bol rahe hain na woh hamara contact hai teen saal contact toh us uske saath kaam ho raha hai kaam aa raha hai koi baat nahi jo jo truth hai wohi hum bolte hain kaam ho raha hai lekin IndiaMART jab hum shuru kiya tha mera pitaji interest tha chalo ek baar IndiaMART se kaam karke dekhe kyunki hamara IndiaMART se pehle hum juda hua tha juda hua karta tha lekin hamara jo woh jo uncle hai na 9 Prameet Kumar ji Prameet ji woh actual yeh yeh yeh secret baat hai mam yeh aapko kabhi nahi woh bhul se kabhi nahi bolega mam yeh actual woh interest nahi hai hamara jo dusra partner hai na 303 wale haan haan haan isliye woh bolte hain hum hum out of station hum nahi hai actual wohi dekhta hai lekin jab shuru kiya tha jab mera pitaji jab shuru kiya tha woh us us time maujood nahi tha aur aur yeh isliye unka woh achcha nahi laga.
Executive: Haan maine unko kai bari lagaya samne se phone.
Customer: Aur aur aur aur aap jo aur jo aur aap call kar rahe hain jo mera jo pitaji hai jo unko hum actual kya dekhte hain woh toh executive hai woh total samuche nahi dekhta hai toh unke paas toh samay nahi ek baar ek baar hamara hotel jo company hai waha pe visit karta hai woh Bargachia jata hai ek baar Kolkata ka jo mera office hai waha pe jata hai isliye woh samay nahi de raha hai toh ek baar aap phone kiya tha woh phone kiya tha woh ek baar dekho toh sab toh theek hai IndiaMART se phone kiya tha shayad woh aapka 4 baje bikel afternoon tha toh wohi din ke last tak baat hua tha fir uske baad baat nahi hua toh isliye yeh dikkat hai actual jo hamara jo woh wala jo number hai na woh woh woh actual interest nahi hai yeh hamara trade India mein chal raha hai wohi theek hai lekin mera pitaji kehte hain theek hai IndiaMART toh theek hi hai India trade India mein theek hai.
Executive: Actually sir kya hai na sir ki IndiaMART mein yeh hai ki jitna aap time doge utna aapko return bhi milta hai sir.
Executive: Hai na ab jaise yeh cheez hai ki hamare end se bilkul bhi time hi nahi diya gaya sir.
Executive: Hai na toh is wajah se humko utna business samajh nahi aa raha hoga ya fir utna leads humko aa nahi rahi hogi.
Executive: Hai na.
Customer: Toh ek kaam kar haan.
Customer: Haan haan kal toh hum suniye na kal ke kal kal ko hum ek baar humko aap aapko hum phone karenge theek hai phone karke jo jo aapko jo jo inquiry hai jo jo aapka jo jo query hai woh mera jo query hai woh dekh ke ekdum se woh kaam hoga achcha bol rahe hain ki aap aap idhar Kolkata wala ka koi nahi phone karta hai woh kya hai mam aapka jo company ka dekhiye aapka jo account hai na sir woh head office se manage hota hai.
Executive: Oh.
Executive: Toh yeh kahan hai Delhi mein na.
Executive: Noida pe hai sir Noida pe Noida Noida Noida Uttar Pradesh hai na Uttar Pradesh mein haan ji sir achcha achcha achcha achcha.
Executive: Toh is wajah se aapko hamesha jo calls aaya hoga na sir woh meri taraf se hi aaya hoga.
Customer: Achcha achcha aur ek baat mam main bolna chahti hoon ek baar zaroor aapka theek lage toh lage toh woh aapko aap aapka marzi kya hai mam idhar jo hamara jo trade India hai na trade India jo jo hum portal hamara jo bikta hai woh woh mahine mein do teen baar visit karta hai theek hai toh abhi toh sab phone mein ho gaya aapka jo system mein ho gaya aane ka koi zaroorat nahi hai sab phone mein hi ho jata hai lekin hum kya bol sakte hain mera jo pitaji hai ek baar milne se achcha hoga hamara yaha par nahi nahi aana chahiye mera jo Kolkata office hai waha se milne se theek hoga kyunki kyunki hum jo bol rahe hain ek relation rakhna chahiye theek hai toh toh actually aapki ya toh fir aap mere ko na aapke father ka number de dijiye.
Customer: Theek hai ek baar likh lijiye bol deta hoon.
Executive: Bataye.
Customer: 98307.
Executive: 98307.
Customer: 42.
Executive: 42.
Customer: 117.
Executive: 117 okay yeh aapke father ka number hai right.
Customer: Haan father father ka number actual trade India ka kya hai woh mahine mein do teen mahine mein ek baar unka jo client hai woh jisme karaya woh visit karta hai toh isliye unka jo impression mera uncle ka paas achcha rehta hai mera toh wohi hum bolna chahte hain ek baar ek baar visit kare yaha par yaha mein yaha aapka Kolkata mein jab shuru kiya tha woh Sagnik Majumdar Sagnik da mein aaya tha aur uske saath kya kya Chakraborty iska naam tha.
Executive: Actually sir hum jo hai na jaise aap visit bol rahe ho toh woh service na hum jo hai matlab jaise Kolkata branch hai na toh Kolkata Kolkata ki jo location hai usme provide kar sakte hain.
Customer: Achcha achcha wohi wohi achcha achcha achcha achcha wohi hum bolna chahte hain ek baar visit karne se kya impression achcha ho jata hai.
Executive: Abhi jaise haan ji main samajh gayi lekin hamara yeh jo GST hai na yeh Dakshin Santoshpur ka hai sir.
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Haan okay haan.
Customer: Nahi nahi mam suniye suniye na mam abhi abhi hamara jo uncle hai dusra uncle woh bula rahe hain toh theek hai good night good evening toh kal baat hoga theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai main aapko kal 10 baje call karti hoon hai na.
Customer: Ji okay okay.
Executive: Okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's inquiries are not being responded to.

- Balance of buyleads has been wasted.

- Wants IndiaMART services to be properly used.



Resolution:

- Executive will check the system and resolve issues.

- Executive will call the customer at 10:30 AM.

- Customer provided his father's number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call customer at 10 AM tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, follow up, trade india
